mapper.insert: insert into product( productId, deliveryType, deliveryPrice, cateCode, productName, productPrice, productDiscount, productSalesPrice, productUnit, productPackType, productWeight, productOrigin, productTotal, productExpireDate, productBrand, productContentTitle, productContent, creDate, name, join_type ) values( #{productId}, #{deliveryType}, #{deliveryPrice}, #{productPrice}, #{cateCode}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productDiscount}, #{productSalesPrice}, #{productUnit}, #{productPackType}, #{productWeight}, #{productOrigin}, #{productTotal}, #{productExpireDate}, #{productBrand}, #{productContentTitle}, #{productContent}, #{creDate}, #{name}, #{join_type} )
insert into product_img (imgId, productId, fileName, img_type, creDate, reg_id) values(#{imgId}, #{productId}, #{fileName}, #{img_type}, #{creDate}, #{reg_id} )
